column2: Uchi is one of those restaurants you just HAVE to try (before you die) and you have to assess it yourself
column3: whether you love it enough to wait and pay the prices or not. There isn't enough beautiful words that I can string together to explain my experience or the recommendations above. Not only is the food impeccably satisfying
column4: but the service is pretty great too. There's not much else you can ask for when you already have good food
